title: Configure Sitefinity with SAML2 Authentication
content:
Gonna base this off the [old SAML](https://knowledgebase.progress.com/articles/Article/How-to-configure-external-STS-Login-using-SAML-token) article from progress. It's so old it's not even referencing the latest Nuget packages.

Add the following NUGET packages

* [Sustainsys.Saml2](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Sustainsys.Saml2)
* [Sustainsys.Saml2.HttpModule](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Sustainsys.Saml2.HttpModule)
* [Sustainsys.Saml2.Owin](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Sustainsys.Saml2.Owin)

Now just register the provider in the Global.asax and impliment the handler, should be good to go!
